front.title: Color Operation with BGP Label Unicast

abstract.t: This document specifies how to carry colored path advertisement viaan enhancement to the existing protocol BGP Label Unicast. It would allowbackward compatibility with RFC8277. The targeted solution is to use stack of labels advertised via BGPLabel Unicast 2.0 for end to end traffic steering across multiple IGP domains. Theoperation is similar to Segment Routing. This proposed protocol will convey the necessary reachability informationto the ingress PE node to construct an end to end path. There is a major change of protocol format starting from this updateddraft.
